original_text: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.
korean_text: 이 갓 자손이 군대 지휘관이 되어 그 작은 자는 백부장이요, 그 큰 자는 천부장이더니

sentences.original_text: These were of the sons of Gad
one of the least was over a hundred
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 작은 자는 백 명을 다스렸고

sentences.original_text: and the greatest over a thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 큰 자는 천 명을 다스렸다
